tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE landfill_inspection_reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  date DATE,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(100),
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE landfill_inspection_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
    landfill_location VARCHAR(100),
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE inspection_findings (
    finding_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    finding_description TEXT,
    severity_level VARCHAR(10),
    CONSTRAINT fk_report_id FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES landfill_inspection_reports(report_id)
);

CREATE TABLE landfill_inspection_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspection_date DATE,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
  compliance_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE landfill_locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(50),
  city VARCHAR(50),
  state VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE inspection_findings (
  finding_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT REFERENCES landfill_inspection_reports(report_id),
  finding_description TEXT,
  severity_level VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE inspection_photos (
  photo_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT REFERENCES landfill_inspection_reports(report_id),
  photo_url VARCHAR(255),
  photo_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE landfill_inspection_reports (
   id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   report_date DATE,
   inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
   inspection_type VARCHAR(50),
   compliance_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE landfill_sites (
   site_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   site_name VARCHAR(100),
   site_location VARCHAR(100),
   site_capacity DECIMAL(10,2),
   site_owner VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE violations (
   violation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   violation_description TEXT,
   violation_date DATE,
   inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
   inspection_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE inspectors (
   inspector_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
   inspector_email VARCHAR(100),
   inspector_phone VARCHAR(15),
   inspector_department VARCHAR(50)
);
